## Why use Projects?

One of the challenges in any project especially with data is staying organized.\
Manuscripts, Datasets, Images etc are all usually saved in multiple locations slowing down efficiency in a big way.\
R Projects is a neat way to force one to remain organized.

Working with projects improves the ease of use of R signinificantly and is HIGHLY RECOMMENDED.

For the purpose of this course we will be using projects and highly recommend you do the same for all your projects.
